sqlExec:
update verse set content = '[{"sq":0,"T":"O ","tC":"v","rL":[],"pr":true},{"sq":1,"T":"presbítero ","tC":"v","rL":["G4245"]},{"sq":2,"T":"ao ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":3,"T":"amado ","tC":"v","rL":["G27"]},{"sq":4,"T":"Gaio","tC":"v","rL":["G1050"]},{"sq":5,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":6,"T":"a ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":7,"T":"quem ","tC":"v","rL":["G3739"]},{"sq":8,"T":"eu ","tC":"v","rL":["G1473"]},{"sq":9,"T":"amo ","tC":"v","rL":["G25","G5719"]},{"sq":10,"T":"na ","tC":"v","rL":["G1722"]},{"sq":11,"T":"verdade","tC":"v","rL":["G225"]},{"sq":12,"T":". ","tC":"v"}]',  content_with_out_format = 'O presbítero ao amado Gaio, a quem eu amo na verdade.' 
            where verse.id_book = 64 
            and verse.number_chapter = 1
            and verse.number_verse = 1
            and verse.id_bible_version = (select b.id from bible_version b where b.hash='3bacbf2808d23b43584cf0b591d1a879' limit 1) ;

update verse set content = '[{"sq":0,"T":"Amado","tC":"v","rL":["G27"]},{"sq":1,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":2,"T":"acima ","tC":"v","rL":["G4012"]},{"sq":3,"T":"de ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":4,"T":"tudo","tC":"v","rL":["G3956"]},{"sq":5,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":6,"T":"faço ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":7,"T":"votos ","tC":"v","rL":["G2172","G5736"]},{"sq":8,"T":"por ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":9,"T":"tua ","tC":"v","rL":["G4571"]},{"sq":10,"T":"prosperidade ","tC":"v","rL":["G2137","G5745"]},{"sq":11,"T":"e ","tC":"v","rL":["G2532"]},{"sq":12,"T":"saúde","tC":"v","rL":["G5198","G5721"]},{"sq":13,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":14,"T":"assim ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":15,"T":"como ","tC":"v","rL":["G2531"]},{"sq":16,"T":"é ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":17,"T":"próspera ","tC":"v","rL":["G2137","G5743"]},{"sq":18,"T":"a ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":19,"T":"tua ","tC":"v","rL":["G4675"]},{"sq":20,"T":"alma","tC":"v","rL":["G5590"]},{"sq":21,"T":". ","tC":"v"}]',  content_with_out_format = 'Amado, acima de tudo, faço votos por tua prosperidade e saúde, assim como é próspera a tua alma.' 
            where verse.id_book = 64 
            and verse.number_chapter = 1
            and verse.number_verse = 2
            and verse.id_bible_version = (select b.id from bible_version b where b.hash='3bacbf2808d23b43584cf0b591d1a879' limit 1) ;

update verse set content = '[{"sq":0,"T":"Pois ","tC":"v","rL":["G1063"],"pr":true},{"sq":1,"T":"fiquei ","tC":"v","rL":["G5463"]},{"sq":2,"T":"sobremodo ","tC":"v","rL":["G3029"]},{"sq":3,"T":"alegre ","tC":"v","rL":["G5463","G5644"]},{"sq":4,"T":"pela ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":5,"T":"vinda ","tC":"v","rL":["G2064","G5740"]},{"sq":6,"T":"de ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":7,"T":"irmãos ","tC":"v","rL":["G80"]},{"sq":8,"T":"e ","tC":"v","rL":["G2532"]},{"sq":9,"T":"pelo ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":10,"T":"seu ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":11,"T":"testemunho ","tC":"v","rL":["G3140","G5723"]},{"sq":12,"T":"da ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":13,"T":"tua ","tC":"v","rL":["G4675"]},{"sq":14,"T":"verdade","tC":"v","rL":["G225"]},{"sq":15,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":16,"T":"como ","tC":"v","rL":["G2531"]},{"sq":17,"T":"tu ","tC":"v","rL":["G4771"]},{"sq":18,"T":"andas ","tC":"v","rL":["G4043","G5719"]},{"sq":19,"T":"na ","tC":"v","rL":["G1722"]},{"sq":20,"T":"verdade","tC":"v","rL":["G225"]},{"sq":21,"T":". ","tC":"v"}]',  content_with_out_format = 'Pois fiquei sobremodo alegre pela vinda de irmãos e pelo seu testemunho da tua verdade, como tu andas na verdade.' 
            where verse.id_book = 64 
            and verse.number_chapter = 1
            and verse.number_verse = 3
            and verse.id_bible_version = (select b.id from bible_version b where b.hash='3bacbf2808d23b43584cf0b591d1a879' limit 1) ;

update verse set content = '[{"sq":0,"T":"Não ","tC":"v","rL":["G3756"]},{"sq":1,"T":"tenho ","tC":"v","rL":["G2192","G5719"]},{"sq":2,"T":"maior ","tC":"v","rL":["G3186","G5130"]},{"sq":3,"T":"alegria ","tC":"v","rL":["G5479"]},{"sq":4,"T":"do ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":5,"T":"que ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":6,"T":"esta","tC":"v","rL":["G2443"]},{"sq":7,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":8,"T":"a ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":9,"T":"de ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":10,"T":"ouvir ","tC":"v","rL":["G191","G5719"]},{"sq":11,"T":"que ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":12,"T":"meus ","tC":"v","rL":["G1699"]},{"sq":13,"T":"filhos ","tC":"v","rL":["G5043"]},{"sq":14,"T":"andam ","tC":"v","rL":["G4043","G5723"]},{"sq":15,"T":"na ","tC":"v","rL":["G1722"]},{"sq":16,"T":"verdade","tC":"v","rL":["G225"]},{"sq":17,"T":". ","tC":"v"}]',  content_with_out_format = 'Não tenho maior alegria do que esta, a de ouvir que meus filhos andam na verdade.' 
            where verse.id_book = 64 
            and verse.number_chapter = 1
            and verse.number_verse = 4
            and verse.id_bible_version = (select b.id from bible_version b where b.hash='3bacbf2808d23b43584cf0b591d1a879' limit 1) ;

update verse set content = '[{"sq":0,"T":"Amado","tC":"v","rL":["G27"]},{"sq":1,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":2,"T":"procedes ","tC":"v","rL":["G4160","G5719"]},{"sq":3,"T":"fielmente ","tC":"v","rL":["G4103"]},{"sq":4,"T":"naquilo ","tC":"v","rL":["G1437"]},{"sq":5,"T":"que ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":6,"T":"praticas ","tC":"v","rL":["G2038","G5667"]},{"sq":7,"T":"para ","tC":"v","rL":["G1519"]},{"sq":8,"T":"com ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":9,"T":"os ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":10,"T":"irmãos","tC":"v","rL":["G80"]},{"sq":11,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":12,"T":"e ","tC":"v","rL":["G2532"]},{"sq":13,"T":"isto ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":14,"T":"fazes ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":15,"T":"mesmo ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":16,"T":"quando ","tC":"v","rL":["G1519"]},{"sq":17,"T":"são ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":18,"T":"estrangeiros","tC":"v","rL":["G3581"]},{"sq":19,"T":", ","tC":"v"}]',  content_with_out_format = 'Amado, procedes fielmente naquilo que praticas para com os irmãos, e isto fazes mesmo quando são estrangeiros,' 
            where verse.id_book = 64 
            and verse.number_chapter = 1
            and verse.number_verse = 5
            and verse.id_bible_version = (select b.id from bible_version b where b.hash='3bacbf2808d23b43584cf0b591d1a879' limit 1) ;

update verse set content = '[{"sq":0,"T":"os ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":1,"T":"quais","tC":"v","rL":["G3739"]},{"sq":2,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":3,"T":"perante ","tC":"v","rL":["G1799"]},{"sq":4,"T":"a ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":5,"T":"igreja","tC":"v","rL":["G1577"]},{"sq":6,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":7,"T":"deram ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":8,"T":"testemunho ","tC":"v","rL":["G3140","G5656"]},{"sq":9,"T":"do ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":10,"T":"teu ","tC":"v","rL":["G4675"]},{"sq":11,"T":"amor","tC":"v","rL":["G26"]},{"sq":12,"T":". ","tC":"v"},{"sq":13,"T":"Bem ","tC":"v","rL":["G2573"]},{"sq":14,"T":"farás ","tC":"v","rL":["G4160","G5692"]},{"sq":15,"T":"encaminhando-os ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":16,"T":"em ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":17,"T":"sua ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":18,"T":"jornada ","tC":"v","rL":["G4311","G5660"]},{"sq":19,"T":"por ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":20,"T":"modo ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":21,"T":"digno ","tC":"v","rL":["G516"]},{"sq":22,"T":"de ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":23,"T":"Deus","tC":"v","rL":["G2316"]},{"sq":24,"T":"; ","tC":"v"}]',  content_with_out_format = 'os quais, perante a igreja, deram testemunho do teu amor. Bem farás encaminhando-os em sua jornada por modo digno de Deus;' 
            where verse.id_book = 64 
            and verse.number_chapter = 1
            and verse.number_verse = 6
            and verse.id_bible_version = (select b.id from bible_version b where b.hash='3bacbf2808d23b43584cf0b591d1a879' limit 1) ;

update verse set content = '[{"sq":0,"T":"pois ","tC":"v","rL":["G1063"]},{"sq":1,"T":"por ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":2,"T":"causa ","tC":"v","rL":["G5228"]},{"sq":3,"T":"do ","tC":"v","rL":["G846"]},{"sq":4,"T":"Nome ","tC":"v","rL":["G3686"]},{"sq":5,"T":"foi ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":6,"T":"que ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":7,"T":"saíram","tC":"v","rL":["G1831","G5627"]},{"sq":8,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":9,"T":"nada ","tC":"v","rL":["G3367"]},{"sq":10,"T":"recebendo ","tC":"v","rL":["G2983","G5723"]},{"sq":11,"T":"dos ","tC":"v","rL":["G575"]},{"sq":12,"T":"gentios","tC":"v","rL":["G1484"]},{"sq":13,"T":". ","tC":"v"}]',  content_with_out_format = 'pois por causa do Nome foi que saíram, nada recebendo dos gentios.' 
            where verse.id_book = 64 
            and verse.number_chapter = 1
            and verse.number_verse = 7
            and verse.id_bible_version = (select b.id from bible_version b where b.hash='3bacbf2808d23b43584cf0b591d1a879' limit 1) ;

update verse set content = '[{"sq":0,"T":"Portanto","tC":"v","rL":["G3767","G2249"]},{"sq":1,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":2,"T":"devemos ","tC":"v","rL":["G3784","G5719"]},{"sq":3,"T":"acolher ","tC":"v","rL":["G618","G5721"]},{"sq":4,"T":"esses ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":5,"T":"irmãos","tC":"v","rL":["G5108"]},{"sq":6,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":7,"T":"para ","tC":"v","rL":["G2443"]},{"sq":8,"T":"nos ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":9,"T":"tornarmos ","tC":"v","rL":["G1096","G5741"]},{"sq":10,"T":"cooperadores ","tC":"v","rL":["G4904"]},{"sq":11,"T":"da ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":12,"T":"verdade","tC":"v","rL":["G225"]},{"sq":13,"T":". ","tC":"v"}]',  content_with_out_format = 'Portanto, devemos acolher esses irmãos, para nos tornarmos cooperadores da verdade.' 
            where verse.id_book = 64 
            and verse.number_chapter = 1
            and verse.number_verse = 8
            and verse.id_bible_version = (select b.id from bible_version b where b.hash='3bacbf2808d23b43584cf0b591d1a879' limit 1) ;

update verse set content = '[{"sq":0,"T":"Escrevi ","tC":"v","rL":["G1125","G5656"],"pr":true},{"sq":1,"T":"alguma ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":2,"T":"coisa ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":3,"T":"à ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":4,"T":"igreja","tC":"v","rL":["G1577"]},{"sq":5,"T":"; ","tC":"v"},{"sq":6,"T":"mas ","tC":"v","rL":["G235"]},{"sq":7,"T":"Diótrefes","tC":"v","rL":["G1361"]},{"sq":8,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":9,"T":"que ","tC":"v","rL":["G3588"]},{"sq":10,"T":"gosta ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":11,"T":"de ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":12,"T":"exercer ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":13,"T":"a ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":14,"T":"primazia ","tC":"v","rL":["G5383","G5723"]},{"sq":15,"T":"entre ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":16,"T":"eles","tC":"v","rL":["G846"]},{"sq":17,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":18,"T":"não ","tC":"v","rL":["G3756"]},{"sq":19,"T":"nos ","tC":"v","rL":["G2248"]},{"sq":20,"T":"dá ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":21,"T":"acolhida","tC":"v","rL":["G1926","G5736"]},{"sq":22,"T":". ","tC":"v"}]',  content_with_out_format = 'Escrevi alguma coisa à igreja; mas Diótrefes, que gosta de exercer a primazia entre eles, não nos dá acolhida.' 
            where verse.id_book = 64 
            and verse.number_chapter = 1
            and verse.number_verse = 9
            and verse.id_bible_version = (select b.id from bible_version b where b.hash='3bacbf2808d23b43584cf0b591d1a879' limit 1) ;

update verse set content = '[{"sq":0,"T":"Quanto ","tC":"v","rL":[],"pr":true},{"sq":1,"T":"a ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":2,"T":"Demétrio","tC":"v","rL":["G1216","G5259"]},{"sq":3,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":4,"T":"todos ","tC":"v","rL":["G3956"]},{"sq":5,"T":"lhe ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":6,"T":"dão ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":7,"T":"testemunho","tC":"v","rL":["G3140","G5769","G2532"]},{"sq":8,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":9,"T":"até ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":10,"T":"a ","tC":"v","rL":["G5259"]},{"sq":11,"T":"própria ","tC":"v","rL":["G846"]},{"sq":12,"T":"verdade","tC":"v","rL":["G225"]},{"sq":13,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":14,"T":"e ","tC":"v","rL":["G1161"]},{"sq":15,"T":"nós ","tC":"v","rL":["G2249"]},{"sq":16,"T":"também ","tC":"v","rL":["G2532"]},{"sq":17,"T":"damos ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":18,"T":"testemunho","tC":"v","rL":["G3140","G5719"]},{"sq":19,"T":"; ","tC":"v"},{"sq":20,"T":"e ","tC":"v","rL":["G2532"]},{"sq":21,"T":"sabes ","tC":"v","rL":["G1492","G5758"]},{"sq":22,"T":"que ","tC":"v","rL":["G3754"]},{"sq":23,"T":"o ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":24,"T":"nosso ","tC":"v","rL":["G2257"]},{"sq":25,"T":"testemunho ","tC":"v","rL":["G3141"]},{"sq":26,"T":"é ","tC":"v","rL":["G2076","G5748"]},{"sq":27,"T":"verdadeiro","tC":"v","rL":["G227"]},{"sq":28,"T":". ","tC":"v"}]',  content_with_out_format = 'Quanto a Demétrio, todos lhe dão testemunho, até a própria verdade, e nós também damos testemunho; e sabes que o nosso testemunho é verdadeiro.' 
            where verse.id_book = 64 
            and verse.number_chapter = 1
            and verse.number_verse = 12
            and verse.id_bible_version = (select b.id from bible_version b where b.hash='3bacbf2808d23b43584cf0b591d1a879' limit 1) ;

update verse set content = '[{"sq":0,"T":"Muitas ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":1,"T":"coisas ","tC":"v","rL":["G4183"]},{"sq":2,"T":"tinha ","tC":"v","rL":["G2192","G5707"]},{"sq":3,"T":"que ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":4,"T":"te ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":5,"T":"escrever","tC":"v","rL":["G1125","G5721"]},{"sq":6,"T":"; ","tC":"v"},{"sq":7,"T":"todavia","tC":"v","rL":["G235"]},{"sq":8,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":9,"T":"não ","tC":"v","rL":["G3756"]},{"sq":10,"T":"quis ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":11,"T":"fazê-lo ","tC":"v","rL":["G2309","G5719"]},{"sq":12,"T":"com ","tC":"v","rL":["G1223"]},{"sq":13,"T":"tinta ","tC":"v","rL":["G3188"]},{"sq":14,"T":"e ","tC":"v","rL":["G2532"]},{"sq":15,"T":"pena","tC":"v","rL":["G2563","G1125","G5658","G4671"]},{"sq":16,"T":", ","tC":"v"}]',  content_with_out_format = 'Muitas coisas tinha que te escrever; todavia, não quis fazê-lo com tinta e pena,' 
            where verse.id_book = 64 
            and verse.number_chapter = 1
            and verse.number_verse = 13
            and verse.id_bible_version = (select b.id from bible_version b where b.hash='3bacbf2808d23b43584cf0b591d1a879' limit 1) ;
